title: E-commerce Website Redesign
description: Led the complete redesign of the FashionForward e-commerce platform, focusing on a mobile-first approach and a streamlined checkout process. The new design increased user engagement by 30% and conversion rates by 15%.

title: EdTech Mobile App
description: Designed and developed a mobile application for LearnSphere, an educational platform for students. The app features interactive quizzes, video lectures, and progress tracking, resulting in over 10,000 downloads in the first three months.

title: Corporate Branding Package
description: Created a comprehensive branding package for Innovate Solutions, including a new logo, brand guidelines, marketing materials, and a website design. The new branding helped the company secure a 25% increase in lead generation.
